page.title: 18RELIGION IN CANFORD MAGNA
page.content: The Rev Ian Savile,4\ years vicar of Canford Magna parish,has been assisted for 3\ years by his curate ex solicit -or Martyn Cripps,& joined in 1985 by assistant curate David Ella,an ex pol- iceman.They serve 4 churches of area. {CANFORD MAGNA CHURCH}dates from approx 1000 A.D. and is recorded in the Domes day Book.Originally Saxon,mainly Nor- man and altered many times over centur -ies,it now has closed circuit televis -ion as an aid to worship.In contrast, the{LANTERN,}is a church-cum-hall and was built in 1976 in modern style(see slide).Growing congregations average 200 at the LANTERN and 375 at CANFORD MAGNA on Sundays.About 300 pupils of CANFORD SCHOOL also attend,the Parish Church is their chapel.
